title: DevTouchMovementMode
content:
This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
To submit a bug report on the content, see
https://devforum.roblox.com/c/bug-reports/documentation-issues/72

name: DevTouchMovementMode
type: enum
summary: |
  Overrides the movement mode of players who are playing on touch-enabled
  devices.
description: |
  Overrides the movement mode of players who are playing on touch-enabled
  devices.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: UserChoice
    summary: |
      Allows players to choose their desired control scheme from the
      in-experience menu. This is the default movement mode.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Thumbstick
    summary: ''
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: |
      Use DynamicThumbstick instead.
  - name: DPad
    summary: ''
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: |
      Use DynamicThumbstick instead.
  - name: Thumbpad
    summary: ''
    value: 3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: |
      Use DynamicThumbstick instead.
  - name: ClickToMove
    summary: |
      The player's character will attempt to move to a location in the world
      when the player taps a location.
    value: 4
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Scriptable
    summary: |
      The player's character will not respond to default controls; any character
      movement must be defined in custom scripts.
    value: 5
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: DynamicThumbstick
    summary: |
      The player's character is controlled with a virtual thumbstick that
      appears when they touch the lower portion of the screen. Jumping is
      controlled with a separate button.
    value: 6
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
